article: Mr. Brown  lives  near Mr. Smith . Every Saturday he  _  to Mr. Smith's back door and talks to Mr. Smith. He always  _  Mr. Smith he is going to do something. "I'm going to clean my house tomorrow," or he says, "I am going to plant some trees in my yard," or he says, "I am going  to wash  my car." But after that, he never does it So people  _  call  _  Mr. Brown. They all call him " Mr. Going-to-do". Because he always  _  he is going to do something, but he  _  nothing. Many parents always say to  their children  : "It's not good to talk a lot every day, but do nothing like Mr. Brown.  Don't be  another 'Mr. Going-to-do'"
